action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings to improve daily workflow efficiency.
notes: Focus on customizing the landing page and enabling accessibility features.

action_item: Users & Roles - Change the main login password for security.
notes: Follow the process of entering a new password twice and saving changes.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update the eSignature ID for enhanced security.
notes: Complete the two-step process to validate current ID before creating a new one.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA format.
notes: Select and arrange patient chart sections for clinical summaries.
